name: PKPaymentAuthorizationViewControllerDelegate
desc: Methods that let you respond to user interactions with your payment authorization view controller.

items.name: func paymentAuthorizationViewController(PKPaymentAuthorizationViewController, didRequestMerchantSessionUpdate: (PKPaymentRequestMerchantSessionUpdate) -> Void)
items.desc: Requests an object that validates the identity of a merchant for a payment request.

items.name: func paymentAuthorizationViewControllerWillAuthorizePayment(PKPaymentAuthorizationViewController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user is authorizing the payment request.

items.name: func paymentAuthorizationViewController(PKPaymentAuthorizationViewController, didAuthorizePayment: PKPayment, handler: (PKPaymentAuthorizationResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user authorized the payment request, and asks for a result.

items.name: func paymentAuthorizationViewController(PKPaymentAuthorizationViewController, didAuthorizePayment: PKPayment, completion: (PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus) -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user authorized the payment request, and asks for a result.

items.name: func paymentAuthorizationViewControllerDidFinish(PKPaymentAuthorizationViewController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that payment authorization finished.

items.name: func paymentAuthorizationViewController(PKPaymentAuthorizationViewController, didSelect: PKPaymentMethod, handler: (PKPaymentRequestPaymentMethodUpdate) -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user changed the payment method, and asks for an updated payment request.

items.name: func paymentAuthorizationViewController(PKPaymentAuthorizationViewController, didSelect: PKPaymentMethod, completion: ([PKPaymentSummaryItem]) -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user changed the payment method, and asks for an updated payment request.

items.name: func paymentAuthorizationViewController(PKPaymentAuthorizationViewController, didChangeCouponCode: String, handler: (PKPaymentRequestCouponCodeUpdate) -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user entered or updated a coupon code.

items.name: func paymentAuthorizationViewController(PKPaymentAuthorizationViewController, didSelectShippingContact: PKContact, handler: (PKPaymentRequestShippingContactUpdate) -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user selected a shipping address, and asks for an updated payment request.

items.name: func paymentAuthorizationViewController(PKPaymentAuthorizationViewController, didSelectShippingContact: PKContact, completion: (PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus, [PKShippingMethod], [PKPaymentSummaryItem]) -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user selected a shipping address, and asks for an updated payment request.

items.name: func paymentAuthorizationViewController(PKPaymentAuthorizationViewController, didSelect: PKShippingMethod, handler: (PKPaymentRequestShippingMethodUpdate) -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user selected a shipping method, and asks for an updated payment request.

items.name: func paymentAuthorizationViewController(PKPaymentAuthorizationViewController, didSelect: PKShippingMethod, completion: (PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus, [PKPaymentSummaryItem]) -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user selected a shipping method, and asks for an updated payment request.
